effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 796,670 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 353,834.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description:
Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 11.5 million damage and pulsing 567,732 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Army of the Light Tabard
